categories.description: Identity and access management controls for Azure resources and services

items.item: Enable Multi-Factor Authentication (MFA) for all users, especially for Azure AD administrators
Use Azure Active Directory (Azure AD) for centralized identity and access management
Implement Role-Based Access Control (RBAC) to assign the least privilege access to resources
Regularly audit and remove unused accounts and access rights
Use Conditional Access Policies to enforce access controls based on the user's location, device, and risk level
Use Azure AD Privileged Identity Management (PIM) to manage, control, and monitor access to critical Azure resources
Implement strong password policies and enforce password expiration policies

categories.description: Comprehensive logging and monitoring solutions for Azure security

items.item: Enable Azure Activity Logs to track changes to resources and management operations
Use Azure Monitor and Log Analytics to centralize logs and metrics
Enable Azure Security Center for security assessments and recommendations
Implement Azure Sentinel for SIEM and automated threat detection
Configure Azure Policy to enforce compliance and track issues
Enable Diagnostics Logging for all services (e.g., Azure SQL DB, VMs) in a centralized location
Set up Alerts and Notifications using Azure Monitor for suspicious activities (failed logins, unusual network traffic)

categories.description: Data protection and encryption controls for Azure resources

items.item: Encrypt Data at Rest using Azure Storage Service Encryption (SSE) and Azure Disk Encryption for VMs
Encrypt Data in Transit by enforcing TLS/SSL for communication
Use Azure Key Vault to securely manage encryption keys, certificates, and secrets
Implement Azure Disk Encryption for VMs and managed disks
Ensure Azure SQL Database Encryption is enabled (Transparent Data Encryption - TDE)
Enable Azure Storage Account Firewall to restrict access
Enable Azure Backup and Azure Site Recovery for disaster recovery and data protection

categories.description: Network security controls and traffic management for Azure resources

items.item: Use Azure VNets to isolate resources and control traffic
Implement Network Security Groups (NSGs) to control traffic at subnet and NIC level
Use Azure Firewall for network security and protection
Configure Web Application Firewall (WAF) with Azure Application Gateway
Restrict inbound traffic using Just-in-Time VM Access
Use Azure VPN Gateway or ExpressRoute for secure communication between on-premise and Azure
Enable DDoS Protection with Azure DDoS Protection Standard for critical applications

categories.description: Application-level security controls and development security practices

items.item: Enable Azure Security Center for DevOps monitoring
Use Azure App Service Environment (ASE) for secure hosting
Enable Azure WAF for web application protection
Secure APIs using Azure API Management (OAuth2 and others)
Automate security scans with Azure DevOps/GitHub Actions (code/static scan, dependency scanning)
Ensure Azure Functions and Logic Apps follow least privilege principles

categories.description: Compliance controls and governance frameworks for Azure environments

items.item: Enable Azure Security Center and address high-severity recommendations
Use Azure Policy to enforce security and compliance
Review security baselines with Azure Blueprints
Use Azure Cost Management for monitoring usage and costs
Implement Azure AD Identity Protection for identity-based risks
Use Azure Compliance Manager for managing regulatory compliance

categories.description: Incident response and disaster recovery procedures for Azure

items.item: Set up incident response with Azure Sentinel
Enable Azure Monitor Alerts for security incident notification
Use Azure Automation Runbooks for automated threat response
Enable backup and disaster recovery with Azure Site Recovery and Azure Backup

categories.description: Automation of security controls and infrastructure management

items.item: Automate infrastructure and security with ARM Templates or Terraform
Use Azure Automation/Logic Apps for security responses
Enable auto-healing in Azure Security Center
Automate patching with Azure Update Management

categories.description: Ongoing maintenance and review procedures for Azure security

items.item: Regularly review/update RBAC roles and permissions
Review Azure Security Center and Advisor recommendations
Test regular backups and recovery
Review NSGs to avoid unnecessary open access
Patch VMs and applications using Azure Update Management
